title: Can't buy things in shop
body: I try clicking on a champ/ icon in the shop to purchase it but nothing pops up. I've tried restarting and stuff... basically I can't buy anything from the shop. Plz help.

replies.body:
Since it's just the shop, have you tried connecting your computer to a different internet connection to do it (such as a wifi-hotspot or at an internet cafe)? Of course, that's not a permanent fix, but it's the quickest and easiest.

If you want to try and fix it, could you please tell me your OS and ISP?
